creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Spiral bound volume, reproduction of a watercolor illustration of a woman outside a house with a car parked in the driveway, and butterflies, in a teal border; 25 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, xerography; bound volume
title: The Feminist and the Pornographer
